lore: These creatures simply cannot sit still for more than a minute. If there is food to spare and no neighboring tribes left, they gather around a fire, jumping and laughing without rest, often pushing each other into the flames.\n\nAlthough all Maniacs go to war, Maniac Warriors are the fiercest of their kind, and often end up becoming Leaders. They are also the most restless of their kind, and need to fight all the time. It is not strange for a Warrior to wound or even kill a member of its own tribe just for fun.
menagerieDialog: (It laughs at a far higher pitch than you would have thought possible. This, in turn, makes you laugh, which makes it laugh even harder. The two of you are stuck in an endless loop of compounding giggles.)
(It's not wearing any pants, so there's that.)
(Unfortunately, this creature is dancing. You're almost positive that it's moving in such a way to cause its rolls to jiggle a little extra.)
(It's always threatening to kill itself. Isn't that what Maniacs are made for, anyway?)
name: Maniac Warrior
